maxOrdersSkipped: The maximum number of orders have been skipped
skipOrderOverYear: Unable to skip due to order being more than a year away

overviewCard.inventoryError: Your next order may be delayed because products are out of stock

skipNextOrder.generic: Do you want to skip the next order?
skipNextOrder.date: Do you want to skip the next order? Your subscription will resume on {{date}}.

pauseSubscriptionModal.title: Pause subscription
pauseSubscriptionModal.description: Your subscription will be paused effective immediately and you will not receive any further charges or upcoming orders. You can resume this subscription at any time.

resumeSubscriptionModal.description: If you resume this subscription, billing will resume immediately.
resumeSubscriptionModal.descriptionWithDate: If you resume this subscription, billing will resume on {{date}}.
resumeSubscriptionModal.descriptionPriceChanged: The price for this subscription has changed and you will be charged {{price}} per upcoming order.
resumeSubscriptionModal.title: Resume subscription

cancelSubscriptionModal.title: Cancel subscription
cancelSubscriptionModal.description: If you cancel your subscription, billing and delivery will end immediately. Canceling a subscription cannot be undone. To temporarily stop receiving orders, pause your subscription.

errorBoundary.content: Something went wrong, please refresh the page

addressModal.title: Edit shipping address
addressModal.noDeliveryOptions: This subscription can't be shipped to the address you entered. Review your address to ensure that all fields have been entered correctly and try again.

paymentMethodInvalidBanner: {{brand}} ending in {{lastDigits}} is invalid. Update the payment method below to continue receiving upcoming orders
paymentMethodInvalidBannerGeneric: Card ending in {{lastDigits}} is invalid. Update the payment method below to continue receiving upcoming orders

deliveryMethodSelectModal.title: Select delivery method
deliveryMethodSelectModal.localDeliveryPhoneDetails: You may be contacted with updates on your delivery.
deliveryMethodSelectModal.localDeliveryInstructionsDetails: Enter necessary information like door codes or drop-off instructions.

notFound.title: Subscription not found
notFound.description: This subscription doesn't exist or you don't have permission to view it.

emptyState.title: No subscriptions purchased
emptyState.description: Go to store to shop for subscriptions
